turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am doing great. How are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some pizzas from a new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, thanks for asking, and what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one that has.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a chicken barbecue pizza with pineapple added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want one large with sausage, Canadian bacon, red peppers, and zucchini.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want want the third pizza to be chicken, pork, and ground beef, all all of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and that was large for the size right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 large extra cheese pizzas, one chicken bbq with pineapple, one sausage, canadian bacon, red peppers, and zuchinni, and one chicken, pork, and ground beef, for a total of $48.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that sounds great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and you'll get the reciept via text!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll go there directly and pick up my pizzas. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day, take care.
